text: I am just beginning to experiment with the UI-Extensions beta to create CRM Cards - they have samples in their github repository that show how to do many things - I would say start looking at those - specifically the overlay-example shows how to do modal pop-ups or side-bar panels and there are some others (deals-summary for one) that show using serverless functions - I am learning a lot from these - <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples/>
please note - these are different from the CRM Cards in developer apps - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/crm-cards>
there is also another channel here for the beta - <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions>
